The authorized budget assigned to scheduled work.
The measure of work performed in terms of authorized budget.

{{c1::CV}} = EV - AC
{{c1::SV}} = EV - PV
{{c1::VAC}} = BAC - EAC
{{c1::CPI}} = EV / AC
{{c1::SPI}} = EV / PV
{{c1::EAC}} = BAC / CPI
{{c1::EAC}} = AC + BAC - EV
{{c1::EAC}} = AC + Bottom-up ETC
{{c1::EAC}} = AC + [(BAC - EV) / (CPI × SPI)]
{{c1::ETC}} = EAC - AC
{{c1::TCPI}} = (BAC - EV) / (BAC - AC)
{{c1::TCPI}} = (BAC - EV) / (EAC - AC)
